<script>
function printtList(page,type=''){
    let data;

    if(!page) page = 1;

    try{    
        data = $.ajax({
            url: '../getListCategory.php',
            type: 'POST',
            data: { 'page': page, 'type' : type}
        });
        data = JSON.parse(data) || false;
  
    }catch(e){
        console.log(e);
    }
  return data;
}
</script>
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="https://marumaru.cloud/img/favicon.ico">

	})

</script>

.category-image {
  align-self: center;
  background: black;
  border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px;
}

  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
}

.categories-list {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1200px;
}

.category {
 
}

  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-weight: 900;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color:#fff;
}

  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-weight: 400;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  font-size: 12px;
  color:#ccc;
}

  background: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-around;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 10px;
  max-width: 320px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

  width: 100%;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;

  align-items: center;
}

				</div>
			</div>
			</div>

    width: 45%;

    margin: 0px;
    /* margin-top: 10px; */

				</div>
				<button type="submit" class="btn btn-navy btn-block en" tabindex="23" style="    font-size: 1.2rem;
    background: #fff;
    width: 70%;
    /* text-align: center; */
    font-family: 돋움;
    /* font-weight: bold; */

					<a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/register.php"><span class="text-muted" style="    font-family: 맑은 고딕;"><strong>회원가입</strong></span></a>
					<span class="lightgray">&nbsp;|&nbsp;</span>
					<a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/password_lost.php" class="win_password_lost"><span class="text-muted" style="    font-family: 맑은 고딕;">아이디/패스워드찾기</span></a>
				</div>

		</form>

		
		<script>
		function basic_outlogin_form(f) {
			if (f.mb_id.value == '') {
				alert('아이디를 입력해 주세요.');
				f.mb_id.focus();
				return false;
			}
			if (f.mb_password.value == '') {
				alert('비밀번호를 입력해 주세요.');
				f.mb_password.focus();
				return false;
			}
			return true;
		}
		</script>
	</div>		</div>
		<!-- 로그인 끝 -->

						<b>공지사항</b>
					</span>
				</a>
			</div>

		<div class="h30"></div>

		<!-- Common -->
		<div class="sidebar-common">

			<!-- Login -->

<!-- 아미나빌더 1.8.0 / 그누보드 5.3.1.6 -->
<!-- ie6,7에서 사이드뷰가 게시판 목록에서 아래 사이드뷰에 가려지는 현상 수정 -->
<!--[if lte IE 7]>
<script>
$(function() {
    var $sv_use = $(".sv_use");
    var count = $sv_use.length;

    $sv_use.each(function() {
        $(this).css("z-index", count);
        $(this).css("position", "relative");
        count = count - 1;
    });
});
</script>
<![endif]-->

</body>
</html>

<!-- 사용스킨 : basic -->
